description: Tracks whether dental procedures and findings should be displayed in the tooth chart for individual teeth.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENT_INACTIVE_TOOTH_ID
columns.description: Determines which teeth should be considered inactive for a procedure or finding. "Inactive" teeth are teeth where the finding/procedure is no longer clinically relevant, so does not display on the Tooth Chart for those teeth
